title: (4249) Luxury House available for Sale in Eden Garden, Samagi Mawatha, Thalawathugoda
details:
Luxury House available for Sale in Eden Garden, Samagi Mawatha, Thalawathugoda on 15 Perches of Land and 2,830 Sq.Ft. floor area. 4 Bedrooms, Study room (all with AC), Spacious master suite with attached bath & balcony, Tile and granite floors throughout., Living/ Dining with granite floors.
First floor TV/ family room with 156 Sq.Ft walk out terrace. Mahogany Kitchen cabinetry with Refrigerator, cook top, oven & hood. Laundry room with washer, Servant’s room and bathroom,Water from street mains, with 250 Gallons of overhead tank,Selling Price - SLR 39 Mn or Highest Offer...
